title: Naina Sharma
text:
Naina Sharma is a fourth year Statistics and Data Science and Political Science student at the University of California, Los Angeles. After graduation, she plans to work in consulting in New York City.
Download My Resume.

title: Naina Sharma
text:
Education

University of California, Los Angeles
Sept 2021 - June 2025  Statistics and Data Science B.S.  Political Science B.A.

title: Naina Sharma
text:
Experience

UCLA Political Science Department
Undergraduate Research Assistant  Jan 2024 – Present
At UCLA, I assist in machine learning research by web scraping image data and validating models used for computer vision applications. My work contributes to developing algorithms that estimate topic vectors and causal effects for image-based data.


PricewaterhouseCoopers
Financial Risk Consulting Intern  June 2024 – Aug 2024
During my internship at PwC, I supported financial risk analysis by creating internal liquidity stress test procedures and optimizing regression models for compliance with federal regulations. I also performed data reconciliation across multiple sources to ensure accuracy in risk assessments.


Bank Information Center
Social Inclusion Fellow  June 2022 – March 2024
I worked on policy analysis and advocacy, researching the World Bank’s gender strategy and publishing reports on the social inclusion compliance of various development projects. My work involved monitoring international funding projects and presenting recommendations to high-level stakeholders.


United Way of Santa Cruz County
Intern  June 2020 – Aug 2020
I conducted research on social determinants of health and race relations while contributing to public outreach efforts. I also designed and wrote social media content to increase community engagement with the organization’s initiatives.
